cause.description:
Wildlife Alliance's mission is to protect and preserve wildlife, forests and oceans for future generations. Our field operations, formerly carried out under the name WildAid, train and equip park rangers to fight crimes against nature, and prevent poaching and illegal habitat destruction in Southeast Asia, Latin America, Russia and North America and the Western Pacific through collaboration with governments and communities. We improve the management of protected areas, support sustainable development initiatives, and empower countries to enforce transboundary wildlife regulations.
1. canada's seal hunt should end now.
2. Health care is a universal right.
3. Hunting animals is not an act of nature.
cause.mission: Try and decrease the damage to wildlife.
cause.name: Universal Wildlife Alliance
